name: Bad Viking and the Curse of the Mushroom King
name_original: Bad Viking and the Curse of the Mushroom King
description: Bad Viking brings you his first adventure. A legendary quest to lift a despicable curse; a quest so important it will lead you to question what you're doing with your life. Meet quirky characters with astonishingly witty names (like Colin), collect items, solve logical puzzles that are honestly trying their best not to annoy you. A classic Point and Click adventure awaits!
